Package Render

Class CharacterHistory

  • java.lang.Object
    • Render.CharacterHistory
  • public class CharacterHistory
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to record the history of all enemies in order to make redrawing them easier
    Author:
    Daniel Marshall

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      The constructor for a character history object

      • CharacterHistory

        public CharacterHistory​(int car,
                        int cac,
                        int crr,
                        int crc,
                        java.lang.String lastImage,
                        Character character,
                        Tile currentTile)
        The constructor for a character history object
        Parameters:
        car - - current absolute row of the character
        cac - - current absolute column of the character
        crr - - current relative row of the character
        crc - - current relative column of the character
        lastImage - - last image of the character
        character - - the character
        currentTile - - the tile the character is currently on
